title: Bloomberg Markets: Eisner Says ESPN Has Nut Run Its Course
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Eisner Says ESPN Has Nut Run Its Course
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Michael Eisner\u0010Chairman/Founder\u0010Tornante Co\u0010Former Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of The Walt Disney Company\u0010Discussing future of ESPN and his $7.5 million deal for Portsmouth Football Club.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
